llm_command:
kubectl apply -n cartservice -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-cartservice-to-redis-cart
  namespace: cartservice
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cartservice
  policyTypes:
  - Egress
  egress:
  - to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: redis-cart
    ports:
    - port: 6379
      protocol: TCP
EOF
